Package net.demilich.metastone.game.cards.costmodifier

Class ToggleCostModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.demilich.metastone.game.logic.CustomCloneable
      • net.demilich.metastone.game.cards.costmodifier.CardCostModifier
        • net.demilich.metastone.game.cards.costmodifier.ToggleCostModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, HasDesc<CardCostModifierDesc>, Trigger
    public final class ToggleCostModifier
extends CardCostModifier
    A card cost modifier that toggles on and off as CardCostModifierArg.TOGGLE_ON_TRIGGER and CardCostModifierArg.TOGGLE_OFF_TRIGGER triggers fire.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • appliesTo

        public boolean appliesTo​(GameContext context,
                         Card card,
                         Player player)
        Description copied from class: CardCostModifier
        Determines whether this modifier applies to the specified card.

        First, the method checks if the modifier has been CardCostModifier.expired due to its CardCostModifierArg.EXPIRATION_TRIGGER. For a OneTurnCostModifier, the expiration trigger is assumed to be a TurnEndTrigger.

        Then, the modifier evaluates its CardCostModifierArg.TARGET and CardCostModifierArg.FILTER and sees if the card is equal to or is contained within the resulting set of Entity objects. When not specified, the CardCostModifierArg.TARGET is assumed to be the EntityReference.FRIENDLY_HAND.

        The CardCostModifierArg.RACE argument, if specified, is compared to the card instance's Card.getRace().

        The CardCostModifierArg.CARD_TYPE argument, if specified, is compared to the card instance's Card.getCardType().

        Finally, the CardCostModifierArg.TARGET_PLAYER argument, if specified, is compared to the card instance's CardCostModifier.getOwner() with respect to the CardCostModifier.getHostReference() of this modifier. For example, if CardCostModifierArg.TARGET_PLAYER is TargetPlayer.SELF, then the card's Entity.getOwner() is compared to the CardCostModifier.getHostReference() Entity.getOwner().

        Overrides:
        appliesTo in class CardCostModifier
        Parameters:
        context - The game context.
        card - The card to evaluate.
        player - The player from whose point of view this should be evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the modifier applies to this card.

        public boolean interestedIn​(GameEventType eventType)
        Description copied from interface: Trigger

        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
